swp.tuilmenau.carduinodroid.controller

Class Controller_Android

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp.tuilmenau.carduinodroid.controller.Controller_Android

  • public class Controller_Android
extends Object
    Wraps all other classes into this class to be used by the activity.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Paul Thorwirth, Lars

    • Method Detail

      • packData

        public String packData()
        Collects all Info and prepares the Info-Package to be sent to the PC-Client.
        Returns:
        A String containing the compressed Data.

      • receiveData

        public void receiveData(String data)
        Used to decode a packed command String received from the PC. After the decode the commands are executed.
        Parameters:
        data - A String containing the compressed Data as follows:
        1. Control Signals with settings
        2. Camera Settings
          1. Front or Back Camera
          2. Camera Resolution
          3. Camera Light
          4. Quality
        3. Sound Signals
          1. Play a Sound by Android phone
          2. Start or Stop a Record

      • setNetwork

        public void setNetwork(Network network)
        Sets the Network
        Parameters:
        network - the Network to set.
